text: Toon City is a Filipino animation studio located in Manila. == List of animated movies and TV series == Toon City has provided animation for: ===TV series=== TV series Studio Country Years Notes 101 Dalmatians: The Animated Series Walt Disney Television Animation Jumbo Pictures United States Aladdin: The Animated Series Walt Disney Television Animation United States Angry Birds Toons Rovio Entertainment Finland 2013-2016 (from "Gardening with Terence" to "Love is in the Air"; from "Clash of Corns" to "Jingle Yells"; "Hiccups"; "Hambo"; from "Oh, Gnome!" onward) Bonkers Walt Disney Television Animation United States 1993 Brandy & Mr. Whiskers Walt Disney Television Animation Wang Film Productions United States Bratz MGA Entertainment Mike Young Productions United States 2005 Brickleberry Fox 21 United States Bunnicula Warner Bros.
